en.today: The universe takes excellent care to redirect you today, sweet fam, as the Pisces moon aligns with the nodes of fate. Unhealthy behaviors will be addressed, bringing about disruption where change is most needed. Be honest about any disarray you've fallen into, particularly when it pertains to your health and work environment. Lagging on greater visions for the future may also cause them to dissolve if you don't outline a plan and execute it. Meanwhile, Venus and Chiron face off, making it increasingly difficult to show compassion to yourself and loved ones. Remember that you are worthy of happiness and success, especially when facing challenges.

en.today: Efforts you've made to climb out of your comfort zone pay off, dear Leo, as the Pisces moon aligns with the nodes of fate. You will find yourself evolving emotionally and professionally, redefining what brings you a sense of security and fulfillment. A desire to take your finances more seriously also sets in, motivating you to explore potential investments. Remember that there is power in supporting yourself, even if you have loved ones to fall back on. Meanwhile, Venus and Chiron face off, helping to soften growing pains. Seek divine guidance while navigating the day, and moments of grace will alleviate any fears you've been quietly carrying.

en.today: You'll be reminded that friends come and go, beloved Taurus, as the Pisces moon connects with the nodes of fate. You'll feel increasingly drawn to new alliances, especially if you've grown bored with the same old activities. However, venturing out to explore uncharted territory doesn't mean relationships must come to an end. Though you may have to resolve personal issues around feeling left out when existing social spheres continue to roll on without you. As Venus and Chiron face off, remember that at the end of the day, you must make choices that are healthy for you and encourage personal evolution.

en.today: Analyze the balance between your professional and private life, dear Gemini, as the Pisces moon aligns with the nodes of fate. If you often feel depleted once Saturday rolls in, or spend your weekend dreading Monday's arrival, it may be time to reassess your occupational path. Though initiating career shifts takes an abundance of energy on its own, reflect on how long you can sustain current circumstances. A harsh opposition between Venus and Chiron intensifies feelings of isolation or lack of motivation, which may stem from being overworked. Review your options and consider scheduling a meeting with any superiors who can assist you in addressing the issue.

kh.today: វិភាគតុល្យភាពរវាងជីវិតដែលមានជំនាញវិជ្ជាជីវៈនិងឯកជនរបស់អ្នក Gemini ជាទីស្រឡាញ់នៅពេលដែល Pisces Moon តម្រឹមជាមួយថ្នាំងរបស់វាសនា។ប្រសិនបើអ្នកមានអារម្មណ៍ថាបានធ្លាក់ចុះម្តងកាលពីថ្ងៃសៅរ៍។ទោះបីជាការផ្តួចផ្តើមការចាប់ផ្តើមអាជីពផ្លាស់ប្តូរថាមពលយ៉ាងច្រើនដោយខ្លួនឯងសូមឆ្លុះបញ្ចាំងពីរយៈពេលដែលអ្នកអាចទ្រទ្រង់កាលៈទេសៈបច្ចុប្បន្នបាន។ការប្រឆាំងដ៏អាក្រក់រវាង Venus និង chiry កាន់តែខ្លាំងឡើងនៃអារម្មណ៍ឯកោឬកង្វះការលើកទឹកចិត្តដែលអាចនឹងមានពីការធ្វើកិច្ចការហួសប្រមាណ។ពិនិត្យជម្រើសរបស់អ្នកឡើងវិញហើយពិចារណាកំណត់ពេលវេលាប្រជុំជាមួយថ្នាក់លើណាមួយដែលអាចជួយអ្នកក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហានេះ។
